sqlMap.insert: INSERT /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-RESOURCE-INSERT*/ INTO sso_resource ( type, resource_name, is_enable, description, last_modifier, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) VALUES (#type#, #resourceName#, #isEnable#, #description#, #lastModifier#, now(), now());
sqlMap.update: UPDATE /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-RESOURCE-UPDATE*/ sso_resource SET type = #type#, resource_name = #resourceName#, is_enable = #isEnable#, description = #description#, last_modifier = #lastModifier#, gmt_modified = now() WHERE id = #id#;
sqlMap.select: SELECT /*MS-SSO-RESOURCE-QUERY-BY-UID*/ d.id, d.type, d.resource_name, d.is_enable, d.description, d.last_modifier, d.gmt_create, d.gmt_modified FROM sso_user_role a, sso_role_auth b, sso_auth_resource c, sso_resource d WHERE a.role_id = b.role_id AND b.auth_id = c.auth_id AND c.resource_id = d.id AND a.user_id = #uid#;
SELECT /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-RESOURCE-QUERY*/ id, type, resource_name, is_enable, description, last_modifier, gmt_create, gmt_modified FROM sso_resource WHERE id = #id#;

SELECT /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-RESOURCE-QUERY-BY-RESOURCE-NAME*/ id, type, resource_name, is_enable, description, last_modifier, gmt_create, gmt_modified FROM sso_resource WHERE resource_name = #resourceName#;

SELECT /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-RESOURCE-QUERY-BY-AUTH-NAME*/ b.id as id, b.type as type, b.resource_name as resource_name, b.is_enable as is_enable, b.last_modifier as last_modifier, c.description as description, b.gmt_create as gmt_create, b.gmt_modified as gmt_modified FROM sso_auth a, sso_resource b, sso_auth_resource c WHERE a.id = c.auth_id AND b.id = c.resource_id AND a.auth_name = #authName# ORDER BY c.gmt_modified DESC

select /*MS-SSO-RESOURCE-QUERY-BY-APP-ID-AND-USER-NAME*/ g.id AS id, g.type as type, g.resource_name AS resource_name, g.description AS description, g.is_enable AS is_enable, g.last_modifier AS last_modifier, g.gmt_create AS gmt_create, g.gmt_modified AS gmt_modified from sso_user a, sso_user_role b, sso_role_auth c, sso_auth d, sso_auth_resource e, sso_app f, sso_resource g where a.id = b.user_id and a.is_enable = 1 AND a.id = #userId# AND b.role_id = c.role_id AND c.auth_id = d.id AND d.id = e.auth_id AND d.app_id = f.id AND f.app_name = #appName# AND e.resource_id = g.id AND g.is_enable = 1
sqlMap.delete: DELETE /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-RESOURCE-DELETE-BY-DESC*/ FROM sso_resource WHERE description like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #description#), '%');
